resources.string: What pets are you interested in?
How much time do you spend at work/school per week?
Petential aims to address the ever growing problem of finding good homes for animals by matching users with a pet that will best compliment their living situation using a complex matching algorithm.

Petential will analyze the information you provide to the profile with its matching algorithm. The user\'s ideal pet will be ranked. Each option will include an instructional video and a map to stores that sell that type of pet.
We hope that by using this app we can match you to the animal companion that best compliments your living situation.
